projectPurpose: To provide an optimized miner for the ORE cryptocurrency on the Solana blockchain, leveraging the Jito bundle service for improved transaction handling and mining efficiency.
mainFeatures: Built on top of Jito bundle service for enhanced transaction handling
Supports both CPU and GPU hashing
Manages multiple wallets for mining operations
Implements evenly consumed SOL for tips and transaction fees
Adaptive tip adjustment based on Jito tip stream
Supports bulk operations (mine, register, claim, batch transfer)

alternatives.name: Jito-Solana Validator Client
mainFeatures: MEV-boosted validator client for Solana
Connects to Jito Block Engine for block space auctions
Supports atomic transaction bundles
Enables validators to earn extra tips from MEV searchers
Contributes to reducing network spam

alternatives.name: Solana Labs Validator Client (Agave)
mainFeatures: Standard Solana validator software
Validates transactions and produces blocks
Participates in Solana's Proof-of-Stake consensus
Provides RPC API for blockchain data access

alternatives.name: Firedancer
mainFeatures: New, high-performance Solana validator client
Developed from scratch in C++
Aims for significantly higher transaction processing throughput
Independent codebase for network diversity

alternatives.name: ORE Miner (Generic/Official)

Attempts to solve the ORE proof-of-work puzzle

Basic ORE mining functionality

marketPositioning: ore-jito is positioned as a specialized and optimized ORE cryptocurrency miner operating on the Solana blockchain. Its key differentiator is the integration with the Jito network's bundle service and MEV infrastructure, aiming to provide miners with faster and more reliable transaction inclusion for submitting mining solutions. It targets ORE miners seeking enhanced performance through GPU support, efficient multi-wallet management, and intelligent, adaptive transaction fee and tip handling. It competes with other potential ORE mining software by offering these advanced features and Jito-specific optimizations.
